jobDescription: Logic Solutions is a full-service development firm headquartered in Ann Arbor, MI with 4 additional offices around the world. Responsibilities:Communicate with customers during the project cycle, including requirements, design, implementation, and bug fixingCommunicate with PM and development team in China to make sure the project is on trackSupport and solve critical product and technical issues and troubles onsite.Daily reporting of project process and risksRequirements:Bachelor’s degree is required. Master’s degree is a plus.Over 3 years of experience working on automotive or mobile projectsProficiency in Android developmentFamiliarity with C/C++, NDK, and Android multimedia-related development.Audio and video performance optimization and adaptation experience would be a plus.Experience in IVI mobile projection is preferredExcellent English communication skillsMust be able to work in US-based customer office for a long termProject management experience is a plus This is a full-time position.
